text: allāh ōr utāraṇam kūṟukiṟāṉ; oruvaruṭaṉ oruvar karuttu vēṟṟumai koṇṭirukkum pala ejamāṉarkaḷukku (ūḻiyam ceyyum) oru maṉitaṉum; orē maṉitaṉukku (ūḻiyam ceyyum piṟitoru) maṉitaṉum irukkiṉṟaṉar. Ivarkaḷ iruvarum camamāvārkaḷā? Al'hamtu lillāh - ellāp pukaḻum allāhvukkē! Eṉiṉum, avarkaḷil perumpālōr aṟiya māṭṭārkaḷ
